summary: In FY20, the IRS collected over $3.5 trillion in taxes, which makes up most of the federal government's revenues. Accordingly, the IRS's financial management is important to Congress and taxpayers. We audit the IRS's financial statements each year and issue an opinion on them, as well as on the effectiveness of the IRS's internal controls (e.g., its ability to ensure that transactions are properly authorized...
title: Financial Audit: IRS's FY 2020 and FY 2019 Financial Statements
